title: Lankan national held for credit card fraud: BCom graduate turned as fraud
content: Asian Tribune – Sathyalaya Ramakrishnan reporting from Chennai The Chennai City Police on Wednesday arrested a 30 year old Sri Lankan national involved in a string of credit card frauds across the southern states. One Sanjay Kanth hailing from Sri Lanka was picked up by sleuths of the Central Crime Branch(CCB) of the Chennai City…
